content: उद्यानं (--नः also) {@--1@} Going or walking out. {@--2@} A garden, park, pleasure garden; बाह्योद्यानस्थितहरशिरश्चंद्रिकाधौतहर्म्या <ls>Me. 7</ls>, <ls n="Me.">26</ls>, <ls n="Me.">33</ls>; <ab>oft.</ab> <ab>opp.</ab> to वन; <ab>cf.</ab> दूरीकृताः खलु गुणैरुद्यानलता वनलताभिः <ls>Ś. 1. 17.</ls> {@--3@} Purpose, motive. {@--4@} <ab>N.</ab> of a country to the North of India.
